attributes.action: remove the newly added ancillary ministerial duty of Secretary of State for Scotland from the Defence Secretary's responsibilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Defending our nation is the most important and demanding of responsibilities.  It requires a minister who has no other distractions and can focus on LEADING our stretched and under-appreciated Armed Forces.  

Sign this petition if you believe that the responsibility of Secretary of State for Scotland should be removed from Des Browne's ministerial portfolio - our professional and dedicated Armed Forces expect nothing less.  

The Prime Minister should be ashamed.
